name: Yetisports Penguin X Run*
description:
Move over, Lemmings. Here come the penguins! You take control of the cute little fellows and make them solve riddles, lead them through labyrinths and help them avoid traps or landmines. By using the motion sensors you will guide one, two .. or even crowds of penguins at once. Once you solved all missions, attack the online highscore by solving each map as fast as possible.

Of course there are some helpful features to make this a great experience:
- Tap on individual penguins to make them stop/walk. Or use special buttons to stop/walk all at once.
- Tap on trapped penguins to set them free
- Double Tap on any map point to gather penguins
- Drag the map to explore and find your way
- Let penguins run over switches to open or close doors
- Use mines to blow up gates
- Pause or restart the mission at any point

We feature:
- 26 unique islands
- full resolution on iPad and iPhone 4
- global online highscores
- expect free updates with even more levels

Enjoy great 3D-graphics, animations, sounds, music and ...

Tap, if you care (for penguins)

Become a Penguin X Run Fan on facebook
http://www.facebook.com/penguinxrun

For iPhone 3Gs, iPhone 4 and iPad!
